meanings.definition: A category of animals within a breed that are distinct in certain characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The farm had different subbreeds of chickens, each with unique features.
meanings.sent2: The zoo showcased various subbreeds of monkeys, highlighting their differences.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the cutest subbreed of puppies was fierce!
meanings.sent4: In the world of cars, the classic Mustang stands out as a subbreed of its own.
meanings.sent5: The subbreeds of flowers in the garden added a vibrant array of colors.

meanings.definition: To classify animals into subcategories based on specific traits.
meanings.sent1: The farmer decided to subbreed his cattle for better milk production.
meanings.sent2: She plans to subbreed the rabbits to create a new line of show animals.
meanings.sent3: The scientist wanted to subbreed the fish for a fascinating genetic study.
meanings.sent4: The breeder will subbreed the horses to enhance their speed and agility.
meanings.sent5: The goal is to subbreed the birds for stronger resistance to diseases.
